segments.text: What are you doing over the weekend , Sara ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm planing to go bowling tonight . Tomorrow I was hoping to see a movie . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to go camping , you know , just get a way for the weekend . I'm not sure I'll be able to , though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I have a lot of work . I'll see how it goes .
segments.speaker: S1
